dcterms:creator: S. Kashyap
H. Zhang
K. Rao
M. Sonka
dcterms:description: The OAI 3D knee MRI dataset consists of 1462 double echo steady state (DESS) 3D MR images from 248 subjects. The dataset is first segmented by the LOGISMOS method, and then corrected by the Just-Enough-Interaction (JEI) approach. Four compartments are annotated: femur bone (FB), femoral cartilage (FC), tibia bone (TB), and tibial cartilage (TC).
dcterms:title: Osteoarthritis Initiative (OAI) 3D knee MRI (knee-MR)

dcterms:creator: S. Kashyap
H. Zhang
M. Sonka
dcterms:description: The Just-Enough-Interaction (JEI) approach is used for knee MRI segmentation, correcting initial segmentations produced by the LOGISMOS method.
dcterms:title: Just-Enough-Interaction (JEI) approach
